individual0.notes: Matthias is a biracial male who is being talked about and taunted by his classmates.

individual1.notes: Sue is a black female who is verbally abusing Matthias.

individual2.notes: Kendrick has been phsyically abusing Maximus at school.

individual3.notes: Maximus is a biracial male who is being phsyically assaulted by another male.

incident0.description: Matthias's friend called him a baby.
incident0.actionNotes: Mother called Mr. Penner on 12-1-17 to inform him of what happened. He said he would move the other kid to a different class.

incident1.description: Maximus was pushed down in the hallway as he walked to class. He fell into another student's notebook and cut his face directly below his left eye.
incident1.actionNotes: Mother called Ms. Lester to report the incident. She was not understanding or helpful to the mother.

incident2.description: Kendrick pinned Maximus against the wall in the school bathroom and threatened to beat him up the next time Maximus looked at him.
incident2.actionNotes: Mother called Ms. Lester to report the incident. Ms. Lester stated that she would make sure they were not in the bathroom together.

incident3.description: Maximus keeps pushing Matthias down as he is walking home from school.
incident3.actionNotes: Maximus admitted to this behavior. He was told to stay away from Matthias.
